data.title: A Site Retake Smokes
data.description: Here are two effective smokes either on their own or combo'd with each other, depending on the situation, that are essential to know if you want to effectively retake A Site, alongside a simple Incendiary linup that you can use to prevent enemy players from pushing out of A Main to help their teammates on A Site.

data.title: B Site Positioning to Both Delay B Main Push, and Support A Site
data.description: Here's a great way to set yourself up on B Site, to not only be able to delay the B Main push, but also to support your teammates on A Site with a delay Smoke if needed.
